Articles.Content:
Hi,

i own KSP 1.04 and i wonder why i have no camera shaking on starts or clouds like others which i have seen on youtube. I use Win8 64bit and a NVidia GTX 660. All grafic knobs are set to high and on. What i am doing wrong?

Thanks for helping me.

Andrew

Welcome aboard!

There are no clouds in the stock game, they are a feature added by a mod called Environmental Visual Enhancements.

Camera shake is related to G-force, I suspect your vessel my not be accelerating strongly enough to show the effect.
Thanks for your quick reply and your help. IÃ‚Â´m going to test this mod.
